body.bibl: Rubin, Zeev. “Diplomacy and War in the Relations Between Byzantium and the Sassanids in the Fifth Century AD.” In The Defence of the Roman and Byzantine East: Proceedings of a Colloquium Held at the University of Sheffield in April 1986, edited by Philip Freeman and David L.
